author: arnetheduck
content: we've removed recursion as well, early on - we have a pretty aggressive recursion limit in place since these tend to happen in edge cases only otherwise (like long lack of finalization) - it served us well to remove these - but when replacing with iteration, we also added an iteration limit to guard against excessivly long iterations (ie longer than a few weeks of slots, because these should "never" happen since the chain will finalize or die trying after a few weeks
